books.title: Clean Code
books.author: Robert C. Martin
books.description: Emphasizes writing clean, readable, and maintainable code.

books.title: Code Complete
books.author: Steve McConnell
books.description: A comprehensive analysis of software construction.

books.title: Design Patterns: Elements of Reusable Object-Oriented Software
books.author: Erich Gamma et al.
books.description: Introduces 23 classic design patterns in object-oriented software development.

books.title: The Lean Startup
books.author: Eric Ries
books.description: Introduces the lean startup methodology, emphasizing rapid experimentation and customer feedback.
